title: screen freezes
body: well so lately my screen froze a couple of times and im in 30 mins lower piority queue of it and its anoying because i have to wait that long for a bug in the client please help it only freeze in champ selection.

replies.body:
I'm not aware of any bugs that cause freezes in champ select. These symptoms are typically associated with a *poor or unstable* connection to our matchmaking servers. You should be able to resolve this by working through our [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to ensure your local network settings are compatible with League.

Please let me know if you continue to experience these issues.
